about_the_game:
A 8 costume set that includes Japanese, Fairytale and Menagerie Costumes:
- Traditional Japanese costumes for Velvet, Magilou and Eleanor
- Fairytale costumes for Velvet and Laphicet
- Menagerie costumes for Velvet, Magilou and Eleanor
detailed_description:
A 8 costume set that includes Japanese, Fairytale and Menagerie Costumes:
- Traditional Japanese costumes for Velvet, Magilou and Eleanor
- Fairytale costumes for Velvet and Laphicet
- Menagerie costumes for Velvet, Magilou and Eleanor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz AMD Phenom II X4 940, 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GTX or AMD Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.66GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-750, 2.66GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.2GHz
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
